The event usually begins with a warm welcome to the freshers. Seniors or organizers may give an introduction to the purpose of the event and express excitement about having the new students on board.

Theme/Case: Introduce the hypothetical case or legal problem that participants will argue. Rules and Guidelines: Highlight competition rules, scoring criteria, team composition, and rounds. Important Dates: Include deadlines for registration, submission of briefs, and the competition date.

Eligibility: Specify who can participate (law students, specific levels, etc.). Registration Process: Explain how teams can register, fees (if any), and required documents. Training/Resources: Offer guidance or resources for participantsâ€”research materials, workshops, practice sessions, etc

My Khandwa is a Software Development Company and Training Center based in Indore. Our services include Website Design, Web Application Development, Software Development, Mobile Application Development, Web hosting, IT Consultancy and Software Testing & SEO. We also specialize in Android Application Development. Our Vision is to help our Clients Develop Solution to streamline operations, increase revenues, maximize performance and grow as trusted technology partner to our clients. Our team is young, passionate and highly competitive who is ready to devote what it takes. We fill the time gap by working hard and overlapping our client working hours. Before we expose our team member to our customer, we ensure that they are trained, have first hand exposure to different tools and software development practices.
